concept.title: Combine with SAP Scripting Tracker for Windows

conbody.p: Scripting Tracker is a utility and a replacement to the SAP GUI Scripting Development Tools. It is an SAP GUI analyzer and recorder on the SAP GUI Scripting base. You can learn more about SAP Scripting Tracker in the SAP blog post here: Scripting Tracker â€“ Development Tool for SAP GUI Scripting.
This tutorial demonstrates how to combine with SAP Scripting Tracker for Windows.

ul.li: WinAppDriver version 1.1.0 onwards. To learn more about setting up WinAppDriver, you can refer to this document: Set up WinAppDriver.
SAP Scripting Tracker version 3.15 onwards. You can download the SAP Scripting Tracker from the Scripting Tracker website: Scripting Tracker.
